alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Camp; Cass; Franklin; Morris; Red River; Titus (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 10:45AM CDT until June 10 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Howard County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Eastern Franklin County in northeastern Texas... Bowie County in northeastern Texas... Morris County in northeastern Texas... Titus County in northeastern Texas... Western Camp County in northeastern Texas... Southern Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1045 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near De Queen to De Kalb to near Wilkerson to 6 miles southeast of Hagansport, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Mount Pleasant, De Queen, Wake Village, Ashdown, Nashville, New Boston, Pittsburg, Mineral Springs, Horatio, Foreman, Hagansport, Leesburg, Boxelder, Nash, Hooks, Mount Vernon, Daingerfield, De Kalb and Naples. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bowie; Camp; Cass; Franklin; Morris; Red River; Titus
